###### Endpoint

    https://boascan.io//latest-blocks?page=0&pageSize=6

HTTP Method: **GET**

@returns Returns Latest blocks of the ledger.

| Query String | Explanation    | Example                            |
| ------------ | -------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| page      | page number | 1 |
| ------------ | -------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| page size      | Number of records in a page | 6 |
